subject: CNN.com Daily Top 10
body:
CNN.com Daily Top 10


































'The View' co-host pregnant 
"The View" co-hose Elisabeth Hasselbeck says she's pregnant with second child. Baby due in November.





2. Death on Legoland roller coaster

7. Courtney Love plans Cobain auction





8. Former 'Idol' finalist arrested





9. 4 die in Kansas City violence





10. Germany in losing battle to save glacier




 
















Panda porn sparks panda boom
Officials in China are showing panda porn to encourage pandas to mate. CNN's John Vause reports (April 29)





2. Car chase causes controversy
